cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikai

sentence.kanji: 体育館で器械を使って運動したの。
sentence.romaji: taiikukan de kikai wo tsukate undou shita no
sentence.english: I did exercise with machines in the gym.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's setsuritsu

sentence.kanji: 当社は10年前に設立されたのよ。
sentence.romaji: tousha ha juunenmae ni setsuritsu sareta no yo
sentence.english: Our company was established ten years ago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's temoto

sentence.kanji: 説明書は手元にありますか。
sentence.romaji: setsumeisho ha temoto ni arimasu ka
sentence.english: Do you have the manual at hand?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchiageru

sentence.kanji: 夏祭りで花火を打ち上げます。
sentence.romaji: natsumatsuri de hanabi wo uchiagemasu
sentence.english: Fireworks are set off at the summer festival.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zaimoku

sentence.kanji: 船から材木が降ろされていますね。
sentence.romaji: fune kara zaimoku ga orosarete imasu ne
sentence.english: Timber is being unloaded from the ship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaeru

sentence.kanji: もう一度原点に返って考えましょう。
sentence.romaji: mouichido genten ni kaete kangaemashou
sentence.english: Let's go back to the beginning and think again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shihonshugi

sentence.kanji: その国は次第に資本主義になったわね。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni ha shidaini shihonshugi ni nata wa ne
sentence.english: The country gradually became capitalist.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seigi

sentence.kanji: この世に正義はないのだろうか。
sentence.romaji: kono yo ni seigi ha nai no darou ka
sentence.english: Is there no justice in this world?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hannou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は良い反応を示したわ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha yoi hannou wo shimeshita wa
sentence.english: She reacted well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sarani

sentence.kanji: 彼は更に質問を続けたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sarani shitsumon wo tsuzuketa no
sentence.english: He kept raising more questions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seijika

sentence.kanji: 大きくなったら政治家になりたいです。
sentence.romaji: ookiku natara seijika ni naritai desu
sentence.english: I want to become a politician when I grow up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hansoku

sentence.kanji: その選手は反則で負けました。
sentence.romaji: sono senshu ha hansoku de makemashita
sentence.english: The athlete lost because of a foul.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekubi

sentence.kanji: 手首の関節をひねっちゃった。
sentence.romaji: tekubi no kansetsu wo hinechata
sentence.english: I have twisted my wrist joint.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uchiakeru

sentence.kanji: 親友に悩みを打ち明けたの。
sentence.romaji: shinyuu ni nayami wo uchiaketa no
sentence.english: I confessed my concerns to my best friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suishin

sentence.kanji: その会社はリサイクルを推進しているね。
sentence.romaji: sono kaisha ha risaikuru wo suishin shite iru ne
sentence.english: The company is promoting recycling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasaeru

sentence.kanji: 父親には一家を支える責任がある。
sentence.romaji: chichioya ni ha ika wo sasaeru sekinin ga aru
sentence.english: My father has the responsibility to support the family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oote

sentence.kanji: 彼は大手のメーカーに勤めています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oote no me-ka- ni tsutomete imasu
sentence.english: He works for a big manufacturing company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiten

sentence.kanji: 彼は支店に転勤したよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shiten ni tenkin shita yo
sentence.english: He was transferred to one of the branches.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hou

sentence.kanji: 国民は法に従わなければならないよ。
sentence.romaji: kokumin ha hou ni shitagawanakereba naranai yo
sentence.english: Citizens must observe the law.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saiten

sentence.kanji: 先生は試験の採点が終わったようね。
sentence.romaji: sensei ha shiken no saiten ga owata you ne
sentence.english: It seems that the teacher has finished marking the examination.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toru

sentence.kanji: この山ではきのこが採れますよ
sentence.romaji: kono yama de ha kinoko ga toremasu yo
sentence.english: You can collect mushrooms on this mountain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zentei

sentence.kanji: 交渉が成立するという前提で話を進めます。
sentence.romaji: koushou ga seiritsu suru to iu zentei de hanashi wo susumemasu
sentence.english: We're proceeding with talks under the assumption we'll complete the deal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tousho

sentence.kanji: その事件について新聞に投書したんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono jiken ni tsuite shinbun ni tousho shita n da
sentence.english: I wrote in to the newspaper regarding that incident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saru

sentence.kanji: 去る者は追わず。
sentence.romaji: saru mono ha owazu
sentence.english: Do not chase after one who leaves.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyougi

sentence.kanji: 彼は個人競技のスポーツが好きです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kojin kyougi no supo-tsu ga suki desu
sentence.english: He likes individual sports.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichiryuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は一流の選手です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ichiryuu no senshu desu
sentence.english: He is a top-ranked player.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kairyuu

sentence.kanji: ここで2つの海流が出合っている。
sentence.romaji: koko de futatsu no kairyuu ga deate iru
sentence.english: Two sea currents converge here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sanryuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は三流大学を出たが、今は社長だよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sanryuu daigaku wo deta ga ima ha shachou da yo
sentence.english: Even though he went to a third-rate college he is now the company president.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagare

sentence.kanji: 川の上流は流れが速いよ。
sentence.romaji: kawa no jouryuu ha nagare ga hayai yo
sentence.english: The river flows fast upstream.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuuryuu

sentence.kanji: 川の中流あたりにその村はあるよ。
sentence.romaji: kawa no chuuryuu atari ni sono mura ha aru yo
sentence.english: That village is near the middle reaches of the river.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niryuu

sentence.kanji: 彼はまだまだ二流の芸人だね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha madamada niryuu no geinin da ne
sentence.english: He's still a second-class artist.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uku

sentence.kanji: 氷は水に浮きます。
sentence.romaji: koori ha mizu ni ukimasu
sentence.english: Ice floats on water.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiteki

sentence.kanji: ご指摘いただきありがとうございます。
sentence.romaji: goshiteki itadaki arigatou gozaimasu
sentence.english: Thank you very much for pointing it out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suisoku

sentence.kanji: それは彼の推測にすぎない。
sentence.romaji: sore ha kare no suisoku ni suginai
sentence.english: It is no more than his guess.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's madoguchi

sentence.kanji: お振込みは3番の窓口です。
sentence.romaji: ofurikomi ha 3 ban no madoguchi desu
sentence.english: Bank transfers are at window number 3.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rekishiteki

sentence.kanji: 今日は歴史的な日です。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha rekishiteki na hi desu
sentence.english: It's a historical day today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's habahiroi

sentence.kanji: 彼は幅広い知識を持っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha habahiroi chishiki wo mote imasu
sentence.english: His knowledge is profound.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taizai

sentence.kanji: 日本では北海道に滞在しました。
sentence.romaji: nipon de ha hokaidou ni taizai shimashita
sentence.english: I stayed in Hokkaido when I was in Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uragaeshi

sentence.kanji: シャツを裏返しに着ているよ。
sentence.romaji: shatsu wo uragaeshi ni kite iru yo
sentence.english: Your shirt is inside out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hansei

sentence.kanji: 彼は十分反省しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha juubun hansei shite imasu
sentence.english: He has repented enough.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nukeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はグループから抜けました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha guru-pu kara nukemashita
sentence.english: He left the group.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nuku

sentence.kanji: ワインのコルクを抜きました。
sentence.romaji: wain no koruku wo nukimashita
sentence.english: I uncorked the wine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shidou

sentence.kanji: 彼は生徒の指導が上手ね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha seito no shidou ga jouzu ne
sentence.english: He's good at instructing the students.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ukaru

sentence.kanji: 第一志望の大学に受かりました。
sentence.romaji: daiichi shibou no daigaku ni ukarimashita
sentence.english: I passed the entrance exam for my first-choice college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouko

sentence.kanji: 証拠を見つけるまで逮捕はできません。
sentence.romaji: shouko wo mitsukeru made taiho ha dekimasen
sentence.english: It is not possible to make an arrest until evidence is found.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otagai

sentence.kanji: お互いを信頼することが大事です。
sentence.romaji: otagai wo shinrai suru koto ga daiji desu
sentence.english: It is important to trust each other.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sougo

sentence.kanji: チームの中では相互の信頼が大切です。
sentence.romaji: chi-mu no naka de ha sougo no shinrai ga taisetsu desu
sentence.english: Mutual trust within the team is important.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tagai

sentence.kanji: 互いの話をよく聞きなさい。
sentence.romaji: tagai no hanashi wo yoku kikinasai
sentence.english: Listen carefully to each other.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wagakuni

sentence.kanji: 彼は我が国を代表する作家です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha wagakuni wo daihyou suru saka desu
sentence.english: He's a writer who's representative of our country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wagaya

sentence.kanji: ぜひ我が家に遊びに来てください。
sentence.romaji: zehi wagaya ni asobi ni kite kudasai 。
sentence.english: Please come and visit me at home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mochinushi

sentence.kanji: この自転車の持ち主は誰ですか。
sentence.romaji: kono jitensha no mochinushi ha dare desu ka
sentence.english: Who is the owner of this bicycle?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kawairashii

sentence.kanji: 彼女は娘に可愛らしい服を作りましたね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha musume ni kawairashii fuku wo tsukurimashita ne
sentence.english: She made her daughter some lovely clothes.
